mapper.insert: insert into book_order (branch_id, checked, user_name) VALUES(#{branchId}, '0', #{name})
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(order_id) AS max_order_id FROM book_order
mapper.insert: insert into order_detail (order_id, book_code, quantity) VALUES(#{orderId}, #{bookCode}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT order_id as orderId, branch_id as branchId, order_date as orderDate, checked FROM book_order WHERE ORDER BY orderId DESC

SELECT od.order_id as orderId, od.book_code as bookCode, b.book_name as bookName, od.quantity as quantity, b.price as price FROM order_detail od join book_list b on od.book_code = b.book_code WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
